name: Dixie Ball
description:
I have been working on this game for about 3 months. When I founded my company I swore we would have a game out on our first anniversary. April 8th is that day. And so here is Dixie Ball.

I hope you'll enjoy what should be the first of many half baked maps to come out in the near future.

Your feedback will be much appreciated as I continue to polish this game.

Sincerely:

Christopher Shilts
CEO of 33 Gamma L.L.C.
